forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving overnight. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 45F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain diminishing to a few showers late. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 45F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
